This single is called "Quattro Amen" and
It contains 4 songs in total!
So, I'd like to introduce the songs!
First of all, the first song is called "Slightly Emotionally Unstable Summer".
This song was composed by Ms. Kami Hirose, and it is a song that makes you feel very summery.
And the second one is "Ocha no Mahoroba Ikoi no Toki no Toki" (Resting Place of Tea).

It's really bright and I'm sure you can sing along with me.

The fourth and last song is

This song has the names of fruits in the lyrics, and the choreography and the song itself are very bright and cheerful.
The choreography and the song itself is very bright and cheerful.
